name: Way To Survival: Zombie Rush
description:
Survive in a flooded megapolis filled with peril! Explore the districts of the huge city to find resources, avoiding ferocious zombies or craft weapons and gear to fight them back. Watch out — your life is hanging by a thread!

Way to Survival: Zombie Rush — is a free survival game that takes you to the dark world, sunken and devastated by The Cataclysm. A huge city that used to be a home to millions of people, now is nothing but ruins and skyscrapers’ skeletons over the ocean. The count of those who survived The Cataclysm is growing thin: an unknown virus has taken over the Earth and turning more and more people into bloodthirsty zombies with each day. You must survive in this cruel world and find other survivors!

Here are some survival tips:

Find resources

Search through the nearest buildings: there might be some useful resources left inside. Firstly, you’ll need fresh water and food. Look carefully and don’t skip a single level. With a bit of luck, you can find rare details and ingredients for crafting.

Craft weapons and gear

If you’ve managed to find enough parts and details, use them to craft equipment and weapons that will help defend yourself against zombies and survive in other dangerous situations.

Kill zombies

Sooner or later, you’ll have to face those monsters, who once were normal people, and there will be no time to hesitate. Survive or die — the choice is up to you! Don’t forget to search the zombie — there might still be something useful in the pockets.

Explore the city

The megapolis is full of mystery and secrets. Look through every district of the city, learn more about The Cataclysm that has led the world into chaos. Don’t lose hope — you are not only the only one who survived!
